titles.title: Timber Revitalization and Economic Enhancement Act of 2014
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent certain provisions of the Heartland, Habitat, Harvest, and Horticulture Act of 2008 relating to timber, and for other purposes.
Timber Revitalization and Economic Enhancement Act of 2014

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Timber Revitalization and Economic Enhancement Act of 2014 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the reduced tax rate on the net timber gains of corporations, to: (1) adjust the formula for calculating such rate, and (2) make such reduced rate permanent.
